tasks.label: Prepare OpenMask3D Scene (scan_name)
tasks.detail: Prepare OpenMask3D scene for scan_name scan

tasks.label: Launch OpenMask3D Server (GPU)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate robot_compose_env && docker stop $(docker ps -q --filter ancestor=craiden/openmask:v1.0) 2>/dev/null || true && docker pull craiden/openmask:v1.0 && docker run --rm -p 5001:5001 --gpus all -it craiden/openmask:v1.0 bash -lc "python3 app.py"
tasks.detail: Pull the OpenMask3D image and start the segmentation server with GPU acceleration. Requires NVIDIA Container Toolkit (run 'Check GPU Docker Setup' first).

tasks.label: Run Text Segment 3D (scan_name object_name)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "bash -lc 'source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate robot_compose_env && python -m scripts.temp_scripts.text_segment_3d --item \"${input:objectName}\" --scan-name ${input:scanName}'" &
tasks.detail: Run the text_segment_3d temp script for the object_name on the scan_name scan using display :77.

tasks.label: Run Text Segment 3D with Recompute Features (scan_name object_name)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "bash -lc 'source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate robot_compose_env && python -m scripts.temp_scripts.text_segment_3d --item \"${input:objectName}\" --scan-name ${input:scanName} --recompute-features'" &
tasks.detail: Run the text_segment_3d temp script with --recompute-features flag to force fetch features from OpenMask3D server.
